name: Lumbo Pelvic Support Cushion
descr:
Lumbo Pelvic Support Cushion
 - for the office chair, wheel chair, car etc.
 
The curved shaped surface is ergonomically designed. It fits lumbar and pelvic perfectly. It is made of memory foam, and provides optimum support to lumbar and pelvic, reduce fatique as well as maintaining correct seat posture.
There are two supporting pads in the cushion back which can regularize lumbar movement. It is adjustable for different body size user.
 
Dimensions: 44 x 7 x 46 cm

Colour: Black/ Orange
